name: MendWord Translations
tag_list: translation, interpretation, transcription, editing, proofreading, desktop-publishing
overview:
MendWord is a Full Service Translation Company. Our Translation Services include translation, editing and proofreading by different language experts. We have over 12,000 language professionals on staff that are native speakers of the target language to guarantee best quality and adaptation of your translation to the market you are approaching.

The translation process involves adapting and maintaining the message and meaning of your original text into other languages considering the many different cultural and ethnical backgrounds of your target audience.

Our translators are highly trained and qualified to successfully fulfill these requirements. They translate exclusively into their native languages and specialize in different subject fields such as:

  • Media and Entertainment
  • Legal
  • Medical
  • Business
  • Technology
  • Financial
  • Travel and Tourism
  • Advertising and Marketing
  • Consumer Products
  • Personal Documents and more

All our language services are certified and can be notarized as well if needed.

Furthermore, you do not have to worry about the format of your files; we can work from every program, and of course, deliver your project in any desired format for your convenience. Our Desktop-Publishing-Team (DTP) is prepared and equipped to take care of any challenges.

To ensure outstanding quality of your project MendWord applies a Quality-Control-Process which consists of:

  • Translation
  • Editing
  • Proofreading
  • Final Quality Assessment
